title: NOTICE: Starting Dec 13 - Telstra customers will no longer be able to use Mobile Payment option
body:
Telstra is shutting down operations supporting Direct Carrier Billing for their customers, effective December 13, 2018.

This means that if Telstra is your mobile service provider, you will no longer be able to use the Mobile Payment option in the LoL client store to purchase RP after this date.
If you are a Telstra customer who commonly used this payment method, and would like to purchase RP in the future, please consider alternative payment methods, such as PayPal or prepaid RP cards.

replies.body: I always used this method.... It gave about 1200 RP a month, since I have unlimited calls and text the credit didn't matter to me. This is very... upsetting. :/
never heard anyone even use that payment method anyway
